alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 3:51AM PST until December 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations, valleys 2 to 6 inches, mountains 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting 15 to 35 mph, with the strongest gusts across mountains and higher summits. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 10 PM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
